original: PETTERSSON, Per Albert, Köpman, Mjölby, f 10/12 94 av Per August Magnusson o Margareta Nilsson, gm Elsa Westergren. Folksk, Hermodskurser i bokf mm, aftonsk :r. Anst i mek verkst 11—14, start cykel- & elektr aff m rep.verkst 16, Firma Westergren & Co Konditori 29, ch f sistn fma. Led Mby ved-komm; kass o omb.m Sv cykelhandl.frns Lin-kpsavd, styr.led fi ideella frniar. Medl TR mfl nykterh.org; hantv.frn, hembygdsfrn mfl.
translated: PETTERSSON, Per Albert, Merchant, Mjölby, b. 10/12 94, to Per August Magnusson and Margareta Nilsson, m. Elsa Westergren. Elementary school, Hermod courses in bookkeeping, etc., evening school. Employed in a mechanical workshop from 1911 to 1914, started a bicycle and electrical store with a repair shop in 1916, the firm Westergren & Co Confectionery in 1929, and became the sole owner of the latter. Member of the Mjölby board committee; treasurer and deputy member of the Swedish Bicycle Merchants Association's Lin-kps department; board member of several non-profit organizations. Member of the local branch of the Temperance Society and other craft and local heritage associations.

employmentHistory.name: Bicycle and Electrical Store with Repair Shop

career.occupational_title: Owner of a bicycle and electrical store with repair shop
